pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Tuesday, November 2, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Glasgow, United Kingdom

Private meetings

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Canadian Leadership Event on Carbon Pricing, during which he will deliver brief remarks.

UNFCCC Pavilion, Hall 4
Scottish Event Campus

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Build Back Better World (B3W) Event.

Meeting Room 1, Ground Floor
Area F
Scottish Event Campus

Note for media:

  • Official photographers and U.S. media pool only

12:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend a reception for Commonwealth leaders given by His Royal Highness The Prince of Wales and the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom, Boris Johnson.

New Forest Lounge, Ground Floor
Scottish Event Campus

Closed to media

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Methane Pledge Event.

Meeting Room 4, Ground Floor
Area F
Scottish Event Campus

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Leaders’ Ocean Panel Discussion.

Meeting Room 3, Ground Floor
Area F
Scottish Event Campus

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage

5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Durdle Door Press Conference Room, Hall 4
Scottish Event Campus

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a high-level reception for world leaders and CEOs.

Red Sky Bar, Rooftop
Radisson RED Glasgow Hotel

Closed to media
